# llms.txt
# Site information for large language models

Site: https://www.ricepuritytestlabs.com
Name: Rice Purity Test Labs
Description: Educational and entertainment website explaining the Rice Purity Test, including history, score meaning, and interactive tools.

Crawl-Allowed: /
Crawl-Delay: 5

Preferred-Language: en
Content-Type: informational, educational

Attribution-Required: false
Commercial-Use: allowed

Contact: https://www.ricepuritytestlabs.com/contact/
